headline: A Splash of Greens for Gray Winter Days
abstract: Loaded with greens and other vegetables, plus farro and creamy potato, this soup walks the line between healthful and heavy.
lead_paragraph: New Year’s resolutions aside, January is actually a terrible month to try to eat more healthfully. For one thing, there’s not a lot of tempting fresh produce in the market, inspiring a cook to make stunning salads. Then, there’s the icy, gray-skied weather that quite naturally makes a body crave carb-heavy, cozy fare, preferably smothered in bacon and cheese.
